The Holy Bible containing the Old Testament and the New / newly translated out of the original tongues and with the former translations diligently compared and revised by His Majesties speciall command ; appointed to be read in churches. Bible. English. Authorized. 1668.
ca. 475 p.
Printed by John Field ..., Cambridge [England] : 1668.
Contains illustrated engraved t.p., signed : Iohn Chantry. New Testament has special t.p. dated 1666. Contains Apocrypha. This item appears at reels 859:7 and 1496:4. Reproduction of originals in the Bodleian Library and Huntington Library.
=======
